verbose_text: Concern has been expressed that parabens alone and/or synergistically in association with other common endocrine disrupting cosmetic ingredients including triclosan, phthalates, and benzyl benzoate, may facilitate estrogenic impact and thus increase the risk of breast cancer and other estrogen sensitive tumors [XREF_BIBR].
